Instant eSports | Berkeley, CA | Full-time | Onsite

Instant eSports aims to become the ultimate destination for everything eSports. We believe that the eSports fan experience should better serve the needs of its 200M global viewers, which is why we’re committed to building the one-stop resource for comprehensive news, scores and stats coverage of competitive gaming.

(http://careers.instantesports.com)

We're looking to hire a FULL-STACK WEB ENGINEER to help lead our new web product. Our stack is built off of python/django. The ideal candidate is passionate about gaming/eSports.

Following eSports should be easy and engaging. Join us, and let’s make that a reality.
